import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get my subtask groups"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/subtasks/my/groups"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves all subtask groups owned by the authenticated user. Groups organize related subtasks for better visibility and batch management across multiple tickets.

**Response Contents**
- Lists all groups where the current user is the owner
- Includes group metadata (name, creation date, member count)
- Groups can span multiple tickets for cross-ticket organization

**Workflow Example**
1. List your groups: [GET /api/v1.0/subtasks/my/groups](/docs/api/tickets/get-my-subtask-groups)
2. View group subtasks: For each group, call [GET /api/v1.0/subtasks/\{id\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-subtasks-for-ticket) on associated tickets
3. Manage group: Use [POST /api/v1.0/subtasks/group/\{subtaskGroupId\}](/docs/api/tickets/update-subtask-group) to update properties

**Use Cases**: Batch work tracking, project-level subtask organization, cross-ticket task management.

**Related Endpoints**
- [POST /api/v1.0/subtasks/group/new](/docs/api/tickets/create-subtask-group) – Create new group
- [POST /api/v1.0/subtasks/group/assign](/docs/api/tickets/assign-subtasks-to-group) – Add subtasks to group
- [GET /api/v1.0/subtasks/\{userId\}/groups](/docs/api/tickets/get-user-subtask-groups) – View another user's groups

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}

</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"List of subtask groups.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response containing a list of subtask groups.","properties":{"ItemCount":{"type":"integer","description":"Number of subtask groups returned."},"Items":{"type":"array","description":"Collection of subtask groups.","items":{"type":"object","description":"User-defined grouping container for ticket subtasks.","properties":{"SubtaskGroupId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier for the subtask group.","example":"33333333-3333-4333-8333-333333333333"},"OwnerId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"User identifier that owns the group.","example":"bcaf8610-0a3d-4f08-b1ff-1d951f63d901"},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Group name shown in the UI.","example":"Chromebook roll-out"},"Scope":{"type":"string","description":"Scope enum value (site, district, etc.) serialized by the API."},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Product identifier that owns the group.","example":"88df910c-91aa-e711-80c2-0004ffa00010"},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Site identifier that owns the group.","example":"bb6cece8-e4f4-e511-a789-005056bb000e"},"SubtaskList":{"type":"array","description":"Optional embedded list of subtasks in this group.","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"object","description":"Lightweight list item representing a subtask entry inside a group.","properties":{"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Subtask subject or display name.","example":"Contact requestor for more details"}},"title":"SubtaskGroupListItem"}}},"required":["SubtaskGroupId","OwnerId","Name","ProductId","SiteId"],"title":"SubtaskGroup"}},"UserToken":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"RequestDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"StatusCode":{"type":"integer","example":200}},"required":["ItemCount","Items","RequestDate","StatusCode"],"title":"SubtaskGroupListResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
